text: Bharatiya Janata Party secured absolute majority in 2014 Haryana assembly election. Manohar Lal Khattar was elected leader of the party in the assembly and was sworn in as chief minister of Haryana in October 2014. Here is the list of the ministers:http://haryanaassembly.gov.in/WriteReadData/ExtraLinksInformation/Council_Ministers.htm ==Chief Minister & Cabinet Ministers== {| class ="wikitable" |- ! SI No. ! Name ! Constituency ! Department !
